abstract: Funeral for slain Fox Lake, Ill, police lieutenant Charles Gliniewicz draws cops from across America; thousands form mile-long procession though area where manhunt for suspects continues.
lead_paragraph: Several hundred police officers from around the country attended a funeral Monday for a lieutenant killed last week, and residents of the area turned out by the thousands to watch the hearse go by.

headline.main: Illinois: Town Pays Respects to Slain Officer
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Town Pays Respects to Slain Officer
